sections.heading: related, defined.Closely related shall mean the relationship of being a brother, sister, or parent to another owner-occupant of a homestead

sections.text:
77-3501.02.Closely related, defined.

Closely related shall mean the relationship of being a brother, sister, or parent to another owner-occupant of a homestead.

SourceLaws 1997, LB 182, ยง 2.
